revised_title: Improving Combustion Efficiency of Heavy Fuel Oils
tldr: This article discusses the challenges in burning heavy fuel oils due to their deteriorating quality and increased carbon particulate emissions. The authors describe research aimed at improving atomization techniques and developing water-in-oil emulsions to reduce droplet sizes and enhance combustion efficiency. They also investigate the effects of oil properties on coke formation and combustion.
